text:
The Manager Component doc page:
http://tomcat.apache.org/tomcat-7.0-doc/config/manager.html

mentions a default Manager configuration, but does not say what is the default Manager. 

Please add explanation of:
• What is the default Manager implementation.
• Where in Tomcat can we find the configuration settings controlling that default.

I poked around the /conf/server.xml and context.xml but could not find any setting for the default Manager.

--Basil Bourque
creator: basil.bourque.lists@pobox.com
chris@christopherschultz.net
text:
The standard Manager is documented on the same page:
http://tomcat.apache.org/tomcat-7.0-doc/config/manager.html#Standard_Implementation

text: Thank you for reporting it. While I agree with Christopher that it is documented, I see where a confusion can come from. I improved the docs in r1185590
